text: Juan Ignacio Molina. Born June 24 1740; Died September 12 1829; Chilean Naturalist. He is usually referred to as Abate Molina (form of Abbott Molina). He wrote Compendio della storia geografica, naturale e civile del regno del Cile (1776), latter translated in English, French, German and Spanish. The journal Moliniana is dedicated in his honour. ==Related pages== *List of biologists == Source == *Charles E. Ronan: Juan Ignacio Molina. The World's Window on Chile. Category:Naturalists Category:Zoologists Category:Chilean biologists Category:1740 births Category:1829 deaths
title: Juan Ignacio Molina
